name: The Reversal (Danini)
description:
The Reversal is a short, first person platform game. 

You play as a florest nymph that was called to help a wizard of a nearby village to reverse the spell,  he accidentaly, put in his own home. 

Will you be able to help him reversing the spell?

W / A / S / D- walk

Shift- run

E- talk to the wizard

Space bar- jump

X- kick
